instruction: Analyze time-series data to determine stationarity and apply appropriate statistical tests. Implement Augmented Dickey-Fuller test and other stationarity tests, then apply transformations if needed to achieve stationarity.
description: Analyze time-series data to determine stationarity and apply appropriate statistical tests and transformations. Implement stationarity tests and data transformations.
keywords: stationarity, statistical tests, time-series, transformations, python, statsmodels, ADF test
